review: Going through a fertility issue is very painful, it not only affects physically but far more impact is on psyche. We are really thankful to have met Dr. Bera. More than a doctor he went ahead and supported us and we were blessed with a baby daughter. I really have no words to thank Dr. Bera. If you are facing any issues with fertility please visit Sir and I am sure you will echo the same. While the center can have their corporate culture, doctor plays a very crucial part in your treatment, empathizing you and also guiding you on the financial side. ** ** *** **** ** *** *** ******* Thank you Sir for helping us with this wonderful gift.... Parenting!

Very friendly consultancy. Great resposonse from whole staff and doctors.
Satisfied with overall team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
